name: Arama Genesis OE - Feel So Close

metadata.name: Arama Genesis OE - Feel So Close
metadata.description:
I’m a multi platinum singer/songwriter and this is my creative take on Calvin Harris' “Feel So Close”. It's my genesis digital collectible and available as an open edition free mint to the finest collectors in the space.

Calvin Harris’ music has deeply impacted me over the past decade and it was fun to reimagine the song in a more soulful way. It's especially important as I've branched out from a professional songwriter/singer role to have more creative autonomy and this is the first song I've produced/released on my own. I put my heart and soul into this song and I’m thrilled to share it with my web3 fam as a kickoff to new releases and creations to come.

Massive love to the web3 community for offering a cool, supportive and innovative environment to share and reward art.
Arama ❤️
